rules_text: Mirage {4}{G} [i](You may cast this spell for its mirage cost. If you do, it's an Illusion in addition to its other types and it has “When this becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]The Mata Oasis stays lush and rainy even during the Time of Sands — though it has its own special drawbacks.[/i]
